content.text:
# List of programmes broadcast by Discovery Kids (India)

This is a list of television programs currently and formerly broadcast by Discovery Kids in India. The channel was launched on 7 August 2012.
Current programming
* Bunty Billa Aur Babban
* Fukrey Boyzzz
* Haddi Mera Buddy
* Kisna
* Little Krishna
* Larva
* Mr. Bean
* Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
* Roll No 21
*Shaun the Sheep
* Smaashhing Simmba

* 1001 Nights
* Adiboo Adventures
* Adventure 8: Zoo Games
* The Adventures of Chuck and Friends
* The Adventures of Tintin
* Akbar and Birbal
* The Amazing Spiez!
* Angry Birds Blues

* Angry Birds Toons
* Animal Atlas

* Bunty Billa Aur Babban
